name: Thomas
greetingText: I hope you had a great night's sleep :)
wishText:
Your kind and loving nature towards everyone around you is truly captivating, and it's always a pleasure to be in your presence. You've always been an incredible brother, an amazing husband, a wonderful son, and also a great friend to everyone around you. I'm so happy and grateful to have the opportunity to spend these next 60 days by your side, learning from my big brother. 

We adore you!
